author: hwright
msg: Add a FIXME noting the real solution to solving the javahl directory cleanup
(clean-javahl):  Add FIXME noting what the correct behavior here should be.

author: hwright
msg: When running the clean-javahl target, remove the class files, but not
the "classes" directory.  The classes directory is created by
configure; if we remove it, any subsequent attempts to build the
JavaHL bindings, without another configure, fail.
Later, we should instead create the "classes" directory in the
Makefile as part of the JavaHL build process (rather than in the
configure script, where it's created today).

author: malcolm
msg: Minor cleanups to dumpstream loading in the test suite.
Pass arguments to svntest.main.run_command_stdin() using the varargs arrray
rather than building up a command string by hand.  This ensures that all
arguments are quoted and means that the correct commandline is shown with
Also make use of actions.run_and_verify_load() to load dumpstreams instead
of running 'svnadmin load' directly.  Note that this means that --force-uuid
is passed where it wasn't before, but that's okay.

author: kou
msg: Normalize line break to work on Windows.
source to remove dependency on platform.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add a contrib script I wrote earlier today for working around various
situations where the Subversion server (or something between it and
the client) is fussing about the size of the update report.
